flawed_nl_solution:
Bush is younger than Matt by 3 years, so if Bush is 12 years old then Matt is 12+3 = <<12+3=16>>16 years old
In 10 years' time, Matt will be 10+16 = <<10+16=26>>26 years old
#### 26

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 16. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
